body_html: @QuantScientist Both of the two problems are caused by the overflow of size. However, the exact locations of them in the code differs. The fix for the second one has been found out here, while the first one still needs investigation.
body_text: @QuantScientist Both of the two problems are caused by the overflow of size. However, the exact locations of them in the code differs. The fix for the second one has been found out here, while the first one still needs investigation.
body: @QuantScientist Both of the two problems are caused by the overflow of size. However, the exact locations of them in the code differs. The fix for the second one has been found out [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2451/commits/46c07b1fa0d390c907883e4546daa4c59489736b), while the first one still needs investigation.
